author: Susan Heavey
title: Trump to push for reopening U.S. as millions more seek unemployment aid
description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday plans to announce new guidelines to reopen the economy after a monthlong shutdown over the coronavirus outbreak, despite concerns from health experts, governors and business leaders about a resurgence in cases without m…
